title: Optimize Solar Panel Cleaning Schedule
description: An operator analyzes energy output and soiling data from solar panels on city buildings to schedule cleanings only when needed.

tasks.description: Retrieve power output and soiling sensor data from the city's solar panel arrays.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the performance data for all solar assets.

tasks.description: Identify panels where energy output has dropped by more than 10% due to soiling.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of solar arrays that require cleaning.

tasks.description: Create work orders for the maintenance crew to clean only the identified, underperforming panels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules cleanings based on condition rather than a fixed schedule.
